   National Republican Congressional Committee
   stated on May 11, 2010 in a TV ad:
   "Minnick voted to let the government fund abortion under Obamacare."

Minnick
   voted to let the government fund abortion under Obamacare.

And so we're focusing on the most universal aspect of the ad, the
   claim that "Minnick voted to let the government fund abortion under

But the charge in the ad is not just that Minnick supports abortion

   Obamacare" -- Strike Two in the ad.
